name: Welcome Popup
author: Weblineindia

sections.description:
Increase user interactivity and create curiosity by welcoming your visitors with a personalized message via Popup message. This plugin will allow WordPress site admin to set a personalized message for every visitor, they visit the site first time. You can use this Popup plugin with various options. Customize the plugin as per your need.

Key Features

  • Popup Title

  • Popup Content

  • Cookie based first visit check

  • Delay to show popup.

  • Close popup using ESC key.

  • Never show link, better to use when popup is set to show on all pages.

  • Control for exclude pages and posts, to not show popup on specific pages and posts.

  • Control for restrict Users ( All Users, Login User, Guest User ) to show popup.

  • Customize your popup theme to match your website.

  • Control for display position ( Center Popup – Default, Left Bottom, Right Bottom, Top Bar ).

  • Add your own Custom CSS.

Available in Below Languages

  1. English
  2. French
  3. Spanish
  4. Chinese
  5. German

Translation available in following languages

  1. English
  2. French
  3. Spanish
  4. Chinese
  5. German
sections.installation:
1. Unzip ‘welcome_popup.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory or add it by ‘Add new’ in the Plugins menu.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu.
  3. Go to ‘Settings->Welcome Popup’ in the admin menu.
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

Release Date: August 13, 2024
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.6.1

1.0.8

Release Date: June 21, 2024
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.5.4

1.0.7

Release Date: March 21, 2024
* Enhancement: Minor UI optimization for Information Banner.

1.0.6

Release Date: February 06, 2024
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.4.3

1.0.5

Release Date: February 10, 2023
* Fix: Checked compatibility with WordPress version 6.1

1.0.4

Release Date: August 11, 2020
* Enhancement: Added new options for customize Popup layout.
* Enhancement: Added Popup Display Position ( Center Popup – Default, Left Bottom, Right Bottom, Top Bar ).
* Enhancement: Added option for Custom CSS.

1.0.3

Release Date: January 02, 2020
* Enhancement: Added option for close popup using ESC key.
* Enhancement: Added option to restrict display popup ( All Users, Login User, Guest User ).
* Fix: Minor other bug fixes.

1.0.2

Release Date: May 09, 2016
* Enhancement: Added control for exclude posts.
* Enhancement: Added scrollbar in case of long content.
* Fix: Made don’t display link sticky and solved its responsive issue.

1.0.1

Release Date: July 04, 2015
* Enhancement: Added Shortcode support to Welcome Popup Content.
* Enhancement: Added German language support.
* Fix: Welcome Popup responsive issue.
* Fix: Welcome Popup is clipped on small screens issue.
* Fix: Text editing is out of square with the plugin active issue.
* Fix: Dont Display Again and Close text translatable issue.

1.0

  • Initial release
